name: Challenge - Crimson Horror
description: The pungent aroma of uncooked  meat insults your nostrils as soon as your mind wakes. The ground seemingly pulses in a macabre rhythm and when opening your eyes, you're met with a horrible sight! The forest you once knew is covered in red, cyst-like growths. Thoughts race through your mind but one sticks out: "How am I gonna get out of this mess?"
